subject: Skiing
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Bill Koch, the only American to win an Olympic medal in Nordic skiing, used to introduce his countrywoman Alison Kiesel by saying grandly, “She won the first women’s World Cup.”
snippet: Bill Koch, the only American to win an Olympic medal in Nordic skiing, used to introduce his countrywoman Alison Kiesel by saying grandly, “She won the first women’s World Cup.”
